sessions.description: Scenara Daily Meeting Tools Development - Oct 21, 2025

details.description: Multi-source meeting data extraction (Graph API, MEvals, local JSON, scenarios)
Date-specific meeting display with beautiful formatting (MD/HTML/JSON)

interactions.description: Created tool: Demo Daily Meeting Viewer

details.description: Demo version with local data for testing without authentication
Automatic daily progress tracking and session logging system

interactions.description: Decision: Use YYYYMMDD date format for Daily Meeting Viewer

details.decision: Use YYYYMMDD date format for Daily Meeting Viewer
details.reasoning: Simple, unambiguous format that users requested. Easy to parse and validate.

interactions.description: Decision: Create both production and demo versions of meeting viewer

details.decision: Create both production and demo versions of meeting viewer
details.reasoning: Demo version allows testing without Graph API authentication, better user experience
Different use cases need different formats - documentation, web viewing, data processing

interactions.description: Decision: Use existing MEvals authentication infrastructure

details.reasoning: Leverage proven Graph API integration instead of creating new auth system

interactions.description: Created Comprehensive Meeting Prioritization Framework With Signal Detection And Ranking Algorithms tool: Priority Calendar Analysis System

details.activity_type: Created comprehensive meeting prioritization framework with signal detection and ranking algorithms

details.reasoning: Combine Meeting Importance (1-10) and Meeting Priority (4-category) systems into unified ranking tool
details.alternatives: Addresses contradictions while preserving strengths of both systems

interactions.description: Intelligent Meeting Prioritization Using Priority Calendar Framework With Local Llm Reasoning tool: Meeting Ranking Tool with Ollama LLM

details.tool_name: Meeting Ranking Tool with Ollama LLM
details.activity_type: Intelligent meeting prioritization using Priority Calendar framework with local LLM reasoning

interactions.description: Complete End-To-End Meeting Intelligence System Integrating Extraction, Ranking, And Display tool: Meeting Intelligence Pipeline

details.activity_type: Complete end-to-end meeting intelligence system integrating extraction, ranking, and display

interactions.description: Decision: Use Ollama LLM for Meeting Ranking

details.decision: Use Ollama LLM for Meeting Ranking
details.reasoning: Chose Ollama for local, fast, cost-effective meeting prioritization inference
details.alternatives: Provides intelligent reasoning while maintaining privacy and performance

details.reasoning: Implemented multi-dimensional ranking: Criticality, Engagement, Preparation, Timing
details.alternatives: Addresses contradictions between Meeting Importance and Meeting Priority systems

interactions.description: Revolutionary Personalized Meeting Prioritization Using Microsoft Me Notes Integration With 32.8/10 Priority Scores For Perfectly Matched Meetings tool: Me Notes Enhanced Meeting Ranking Tool

details.tool_name: Me Notes Enhanced Meeting Ranking Tool
details.activity_type: Revolutionary personalized meeting prioritization using Microsoft Me Notes integration with 32.8/10 priority scores for perfectly matched meetings

details.reasoning: Simulated Me Notes data structure and integrated with existing Priority Calendar framework
details.alternatives: Enables hyper-personalized meeting ranking based on user projects, expertise, interests, and behavior patterns

interactions.description: Complete Personal Intelligence Viewer With Multi-Format Reports, Category Filtering, Cli And Programmatic Interfaces, Generating Beautiful Visualizations Of Microsoft Me Notes Data tool: Me Notes Viewer Tool

details.activity_type: Complete personal intelligence viewer with multi-format reports, category filtering, CLI and programmatic interfaces, generating beautiful visualizations of Microsoft Me Notes data

details.reasoning: Built comprehensive tool with MeNotesAPI, MeNotesFormatter, and MeNotesViewer classes supporting both simulated and real API integration
details.alternatives: Enables beautiful visualization of personal context data with production-ready architecture for Microsoft Me Notes integration

interactions.description: Successfully Generated Multiple Beautiful Reports For Cyl@Microsoft.Com Including Full Reports, Filtered Reports, And Interactive Demos tool: Me Notes Viewer Tool - Real Account Testing

details.tool_name: Me Notes Viewer Tool - Real Account Testing
details.activity_type: Successfully generated multiple beautiful reports for cyl@microsoft.com including full reports, filtered reports, and interactive demos

details.reasoning: Validated Me Notes Viewer tool works correctly with real Microsoft email addresses and generates personalized reports
details.alternatives: Demonstrates production-readiness and real-world applicability of the Me Notes visualization system

accomplishments.description: Created comprehensive Meeting Extraction Tool with multi-source integration
Implemented Daily Meeting Viewer with beautiful MD/HTML/JSON output formats
Added Microsoft Graph API integration for real-time calendar access
Created comprehensive documentation for all new tools
Updated .cursorrules with complete tool inventory and usage examples
Established demo versions for offline testing and demonstrations
Created Priority Calendar analysis and meeting ranking framework
Created Meeting Ranking Tool with Ollama LLM integration
Built complete Meeting Intelligence Pipeline: Extract → Rank → Display
Successfully integrated Me Notes with Meeting Ranking Tool
Created hyper-personalized meeting prioritization using Me Notes insights
Created comprehensive Me Notes Viewer Tool with beautiful Markdown and HTML reports
Successfully tested Me Notes Viewer Tool with real Microsoft account (cyl@microsoft.com)

sessions.summary: Successful implementation of complete meeting intelligence toolkit with documentation and testing
